name: For you (tobibob)
description:
Disclaimer: This game works best on Windows.

Play with your cute doggo, Barkimedes. Explore, collect tokens and look after your dog in this smol game. 

This game was created for the Playmakers x UAG MONSTER MASH game jam. 

Controls:
 W = hide
 A = left
 S = leave hiding
 D = right
 SPACE = interact
To pick a different choice, refresh the browser.

Made by Team Bark: tobibob,  Livelyrunaway, Auti-Nic, Pierrie and Qwertyalex
game made for the monster mash 2021 game jam
